item.title: Four Journalists Working for Outlets Including AP, Reuters, Al Jazeera, Killed in Israeli Strikes on Gaza Hospital
item.description: Four journalists working for international press outlets including the Associated Press, Reuters, and Al Jazeera, were killed on Monday by an Israeli strike on the Nasser Hospital in the southern
